content.prompt: Which of the following is true of Gustavus Adolphus of Sweden?

choices.label: He was a major participant in the Thirty Years' War.
He defeated the Russian army at the Battle of Borodino.
He established Calvinism as the Swedish state religion.
He set up an organization to mediate international disputes.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
